name: Strawberry Rhubarb Lemonade
description: This strawberry rhubarb lemonade is super refreshing and perfect for hot summer days!

recipeInstructions.text: In a sauce pan, combine rhubarb, strawberries, water, agave, mint leaves, lime juice, and ground vanilla.
recipeInstructions.name: In a sauce pan, combine rhubarb, strawberries, water, agave, mint leaves, lime juice, and ground vanilla.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to boil and simmer for 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to boil and simmer for 25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Place a fine-meshed sieve over a bowl or pan and strain the lemonade. (Don't throw away the pulp; it's great with yoghurt).
recipeInstructions.name: Place a fine-meshed sieve over a bowl or pan and strain the lemonade. (Don't throw away the pulp; it's great with yoghurt).

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the lemonade into a large pitcher and let it cool in the fridge for about an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with fresh mint, lemon, and lots of ice.
